pages.title: Insulated Glass
pages.text: Transparent glass that retains heat. Use for windows in your sealed shelter â€” lets you watch the world freeze without freezing yourself.$(br2)Craft 4 at a time. Build sealed rooms using insulated glass and solid blocks to trap warmth from heaters.$(br2)$(italic)ORSA Wellness Note: Staring out insulated glass at the frozen wasteland for extended periods may cause existential dread, philosophical breakthroughs, or both. This is normal. Look away occasionally.$()
Glass and packed ice, reinforced with iron nuggets. The ice doesn't melt. Don't ask why. ORSA Physics Division has been arguing about it for months.
